snippet: Aly Raisman added a gold and a bronze to the United States’ medal count, but her bronze only came after judges re-counted her score in the balance beam final.
abstract: American gymnast Aly Raisman wins a gold medal in the floor exercise and a bronze medal on balance beam, giving the United States women's team five medals at the 2012 Olympics.
lead_paragraph: Aly Raisman added a gold and a bronze to the United States’ medal count, but her bronze only came after judges re-counted her score in the balance beam final.

headline.seo: Raisman Adds 2 Olympic Medals to United States’ Total
headline.main: A Wait That Paid Off in Gold and Bronze
headline.print_headline: A Wait That Paid Off in Gold and Bronze
